verses.verse: Finally <WG3063>, my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, rejoice <WG5463> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>. To write <WG1125> the same things <WG846> to you <WG5213>, to me <WG1698> indeed <WG3303> is not <WG3756> irksome <WG3636>, but <WG1161> for you <WG5213> it is safe <WG804>.
Beware <WG991> of the dogs <WG2965>, beware <WG991> of <WG2040> the evil <WG2556> workers <WG2040>, beware <WG991> of the concision <WG2699>:

for <WG1063> we <WG2249> are <WG2070> the circumcision <WG4061>, who worship <WG3000> by the Spirit <WG4151> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> glory <WG2744> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>, and <WG2532> have <WG3982> no <WG3756> confidence <WG3982> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>:

though <WG2539> I <WG1473> myself might2192, 2532 have <WG2192> confidence <WG4006> even in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>: if <WG1487> any <WG5100> other <WG243> man <WG5100> thinketh <WG1380> to have confidence <WG3982> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561>, I <WG1473> yet more <WG3123>:

circumcised <WG4061> the eighth <WG3637> day <WG1537>, of the stock <WG1085> of Israel <WG2474>, of the tribe <WG5443> of <WG1537> Benjamin <WG958>, a Hebrew <WG1445> of Hebrews <WG1445>; as touching <WG2596> the law <WG3551>, a Pharisee <WG5330>;

as touching <WG2596> zeal <WG2205>, persecuting <WG1377> the church <WG1577>; as touching <WG2596> the righteousness <WG1343> which <WG3588> is <WG1096> in <WG1722> the law <WG3551>, found blameless <WG273>.
Howbeit <WG235> what things <WG3748> were <WG2258> gain <WG2771> to me <WG3427>, these <WG5023> have I counted <WG2233> loss <WG2209> for <WG1223> Christ <WG5547>.

Yea <WG235> verily <WG3304>, and <WG2532> I count <WG2233> all things <WG3956> to be <WG1511> loss <WG2209> for <WG1223> the excellency <WG5242> of the knowledge <WG1108> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> my <WG3450> Lord <WG2962>: for <WG1223> whom <WG3739> I suffered the loss of <WG2210> all things <WG3956>, and <WG2532> do count <WG2233> them but refuse <WG4657>, that <WG2443> I <WG1511> may gain <WG2770> Christ <WG5547>,

and <WG2532> be found <WG2147> in <WG1722> him <WG846>, not <WG3361> having <WG2192> a righteousness <WG1343> of <WG1537> mine own <WG1699>, even that which is <WG3588> of <WG1537> the law <WG3551>, but <WG235> that which is <WG3588> through <WG1223> faith <WG4102> in Christ <WG5547>, the righteousness <WG1343> which is <WG3588> from God <WG2316> by <WG1909> faith <WG4102>:

that <WG3588> I may know <WG1097> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> the power <WG1411> of <WG386> his <WG846> resurrection <WG386>, and <WG2532> the fellowship <WG2842> of <WG3804> his <WG846> sufferings <WG3804>, becoming conformed unto <WG4833> his <WG846> death <WG2288>;
if <WG1487> by any means <WG4459> I may attain <WG2658> unto <WG1519> the resurrection <WG1815> from the dead <WG3498>.

Not <WG3756> that <WG3754> I have <WG2983> already <WG2235> obtained <WG2983>, or <WG2228> am <WG5048> already <WG2235> made perfect <WG5048>: but <WG1161> I press on <WG1377>, if <WG1487> so be that <WG2532> I may lay hold <WG2638> on that for <WG1909> which <WG3739> also <WG2532> I was laid hold <WG2638> on by <WG5259> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.

Brethren <WG80>, I <WG1473> count <WG3049> not <WG3756> myself <WG1683> yet to have laid hold <WG2638>: but <WG1161> one thing <WG1520> I do <WG1950>, forgetting the things <WG3303> which are <WG3588> behind <WG3694>, and <WG1161> stretching forward <WG1901> to the things which are <WG3588> before <WG1715>,
I press <WG1377> on toward <WG2596> the goal <WG4649> unto <WG1909> the prize <WG1017> of the <WG2821> high <WG507> calling <WG2821> of God <WG2316> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>.

Let us <WG5426> therefore <WG3767>, as many as <WG3745> are perfect <WG5046>, be thus <WG5124> minded <WG5426>: and <WG2532> if <WG1487> in anything <WG5100> ye are <WG5426> otherwise <WG2088> minded <WG5426>, this <WG5124> also shall God <WG2316> reveal601, 2532 unto you <WG5213>:
only <WG4133>, <WG3739> whereunto <WG1519> we have attained <WG5348>, by that <WG2583> same <WG846> rule <WG2583> let us846, 5426 walk <WG4748>.

Brethren <WG80>, be <WG1096> ye imitators together <WG4831> of me <WG3450>, and <WG2532> mark <WG4648> them that so walk <WG4043> even as <WG3779> ye have <WG2192> us <WG2248> for <WG2531> an ensample <WG5179>.

For <WG1063> many <WG4183> walk <WG4043>, of whom <WG3739> I told <WG3004> you <WG5213> often <WG4178>, and <WG1161> now <WG3568> tell you <WG3004> even <WG2532> weeping <WG2799>, that they are the enemies <WG2190> of the cross <WG4716> of Christ <WG5547>:

whose <WG3739> end <WG5056> is perdition <WG684>, whose <WG3739> god <WG2316> is the belly <WG2836>, and <WG2532> whose glory <WG1391> is in <WG1722> their <WG846> shame <WG152>, who <WG3588> mind <WG5426> earthly things <WG1919>.

For <WG1063> our <WG2257> citizenship <WG4175> is <WG5225> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>; <WG1537> whence <WG3739> also <WG2532> we wait <WG553> for a Saviour <WG4990>, the Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547>:

who <WG3739> shall fashion <WG3345> anew the body <WG4983> of our <WG2257> humiliation <WG5014>, that <WG1519> it <WG846> may be <WG1096> conformed to <WG4832> the body <WG4983> of his <WG846> glory <WG1391>, according to <WG2596> the working <WG1753> whereby <WG3588> he <WG846> is able <WG1410> even <WG2532> to subject <WG5293> all things <WG3956> unto himself <WG1438>.
